title: Congratulations!
#content1 h2 + p: You have been selected to participate in the {BRANDNAME} campaign. You could win a {BRANDNAME} {ITEM}!
#content1 > p:nth-of-type(2): If you want a {BRANDNAME} {ITEM}, you'll need to fill out a survey to confirm you're a real person.
#content1 > p:nth-of-type(3): Be quick, the number of prizes is limited!
#p_modal1 h2: Congratulations, you have successfully verified that you are a real person.
#p_modal2 p: Sorry, this gift box is empty! But you can try again two more times. Good luck!
#lastnameInvalid: * The name of family is not valid (ex. Lambert)
.comment-status span: I like it · Comment {LIKES}
.question span: Do you want to participate in the raffle for a {BRANDNAME} {ITEM}?
#content2: There are no preliminary investigations into your IP
#p_modal1: Today you have the opportunity to get {BRANDNAME} {ITEM}!
Simply choose the right gift box.
#p_modal3: 2) Complete the form and pay for delivery.
3) The package will be delivered within 5-7 days.
.comment-content: I received my {BRANDNAME} {ITEM} today. Thanks a lot!
I thought it was a joke, but my {ITEM} arrived this morning!
I participated, I won and I received my {ITEM} after 5 days. Thank you so much guys!
Can I receive my {BRANDNAME} {ITEM} today? Thank you
I thought it was a joke but this morning I received my {BRANDNAME} {ITEM} via DHL and would like to take more surveys!
Are there any other surveys to take?
Fantastic! I have never won anything before!
At first I thought it was a joke but finally I got my {ITEM}. I told friends about it, so they can get theirs too.
